name: GK-Oil & Grease™
description: GK-OIL & GREASE™ is an innovative and newly developed and technologically engineered product that is fast acting and highly effective in removing surface stains resulting from spilled petroleum based products on concrete, asphalt, rock, and soil. GK-OIL & GREASE™ is an effective blend of microbes, enzymes, biodegradable surfactants, and bio stimulating agents that work in combination to shorten cleaning time, initiate hydrocarbon biodegradation, and enhances containment bio–availability (increases the availability of food sources). GK-OIL & GREASE™ is an environmentally friendly, ready-to-use advanced formulation specifically developed for cleaning petroleum based materials from most surfaces.
